name: 1/ST Bet - Handicap & Wager
description:
The easy & smart way to bet.

Download the 1/ST BET app to help you pick the right horses in thousands of horse races every year, from tracks like Gulfstream Park, Santa Anita Park, Churchill Downs, Pimlico, Saratoga, Belmont Park, Del Mar, Keeneland, Oaklawn Park and more!

1/ST BET utilizes an extensive statistical library, advanced algorithms and hundreds of data points to help you identify horses ready to win. 1/ST BET connects directly with your Xpressbet account so you can play the races with just a few clicks. Look out for additional betting features being added all the time!

1/ST BET is a new wagering app and an affiliate of Xpressbet, LLC, a Stronach Group company.

The Stronach Group is North America’s leading owner and operator of racetracks, including Gulfstream Park, Santa Anita Park, Pimlico Race Course, Laurel Park, Golden Gate Fields, Portland Meadows and Rosecroft Raceway.

*States where 1/ST BET wagering services are available: Alabama, Arkansas, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Idaho, Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Kansas, Kentucky, Louisiana, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Montana, Nebraska, New Hampshire, New Mexico, New York, North Dakota, Ohio, Oklahoma, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, South Dakota, Tennessee, Vermont, Virginia, Washington, West Virginia, Wisconsin, Wyoming.

Must be 18 or older (21 in AL, AZ, IA, IN, KS, ND, NH, WA) to open an account with Xpressbet, LLC and reside in a state where such activity is legal. Void where prohibited. National Gambling Support Line 800.522.4700.
